mapper.insert: INSERT INTO INQUIRYBOARD(num, subject, content, regDate, userId) VALUES (INQUIRYBOARD_seq.NEXTVAL, #{subject}, #{content}, SYSDATE, #{userId})
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM INQUIRYBOARD q JOIN member1 m ON q.userId=m.userId

SELECT q.num, m.userName, q.userId, q.subject, TO_CHAR(q.regDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') regDate, q.content, NVL(r.num, 0) isReply FROM INQUIRYBOARD q JOIN member1 m ON q.userId=m.userId LEFT OUTER JOIN INQUIRYREPLY r on q.num = r.num ORDER BY num DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{size} ROWS ONLY
SELECT m.userName, q.userId, q.num, q.subject, q.content, q.regDate FROM INQUIRYBOARD q JOIN member1 m ON q.userId = m.userId WHERE num = #{num}
SELECT m.userName, r.regDate, r.content FROM INQUIRYREPLY r JOIN member1 m ON m.userId = r.userId WHERE num = #{num}
mapper.update: UPDAET INQUIRYBOARD SET subject=#{subject}, content=#{content} WHERE num = #{num} AND userId = #{userId}
